text: Life and Extraordinary Adventures of Private Ivan Chonkin (, ) is a 1994 Russian Czech British French Italian World War II comedy drama movie directed by Jiří Menzel and was based on the 1969 and 1979 novel of the same name by Vladimir Voinovich. It stars Gennady Nazarov, Zoya Buryak, Vladimir Ilyin, Aleksei Zharkov, Valeri Zolotukhin, Zinovy Gerdt, Sergei Garmash, Marián Labuda. ==Other websites== * Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Czech comedy movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jiří Menzel
title: Life and Extraordinary Adventures of Private Ivan Chonkin
